Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Topology Filter Nat

/--
Show that for each positive integer \( n \), all the roots of the polynomial $ \sum_{k=0}^{n} 2^k(n-k)x^k $ are real numbers.
-/
theorem putnam_2014_b4
(n : ℕ)
(P: Polynomial ℂ)
(npos : n > 0)
(Px : P.degree = n ∧ ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 0 n, P.coeff k = 2 ^ (k * (n - k)))
: ∀ r ∈ P.roots, r.im = 0 :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2014_b4
(n : ℕ)
(P: Polynomial ℂ)
(npos : n > 0)
(Px : P.degree = n ∧ ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 0 n, P.coeff k = 2 ^ (k * (n - k)))
: ∀ r ∈ P.roots, r.im = 0 := by
  intro r hr
  have h := Px.2 0 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
  have h1 := Px.2 n (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc])
  have h2 := Px.1
  simp_all [Polynomial.coeff_zero_eq_eval_zero]
  <;> aesop
```

import Mathlib

open Topology Filter Nat

/--
Show that for each positive integer \( n \), all the roots of the polynomial $ \sum_{k=0}^{n} 2^k(n-k)x^k $ are real numbers.
-/
theorem putnam_2014_b4
(n : ℕ)
(P: Polynomial ℂ)
(npos : n > 0)
(Px : P.degree = n ∧ ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 0 n, P.coeff k = 2 ^ (k * (n - k)))
: ∀ r ∈ P.roots, r.im = 0 :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2014_b4
(n : ℕ)
(P: Polynomial ℂ)
(npos : n > 0)
(Px : P.degree = n ∧ ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 0 n, P.coeff k = 2 ^ (k * (n - k)))
: ∀ r ∈ P.roots, r.im = 0 := by
  intro r hr
  have h₁ := Px.1
  have h₂ := Px.2
  have h₃ := P.sub_dvd_eval_sub r 0
  simp at h₃
  have h₄ := P.sub_dvd_eval_sub r 1
  simp at h₄
  have h₅ := P.sub_dvd_eval_sub r (-1)
  simp at h₅
  simp_all [Complex.ext_iff, pow_add, pow_mul, mul_assoc, mul_comm, mul_left_comm]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at *
  <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (r.re - 1), sq_nonneg (r.re + 1), sq_nonneg (r.im), sq_nonneg (r.re - r.im), sq_nonneg (r.re + r.im)]
```

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2014_b4
(n : ℕ)
(P: Polynomial ℂ)
(npos : n > 0)
(Px : P.degree = n ∧ ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 0 n, P.coeff k = 2 ^ (k * (n - k)))
: ∀ r ∈ P.roots, r.im = 0 := by
  intro r hr
  have h₁ := Px.1
  have h₂ := Px.2
  have h₃ := P.sub_dvd_eval_sub r 0
  simp at h₃
  have h₄ := P.sub_dvd_eval_sub r 1
  simp at h₄
  have h₅ := P.sub_dvd_eval_sub r (-1)
  simp at h₅
  simp_all [Complex.ext_iff, pow_add, pow_mul, mul_assoc, mul_comm, mul_left_comm]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at *
  <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (r.re - 1), sq_nonneg (r.re + 1), sq_nonneg (r.im), sq_nonneg (r.re - r.im), sq_nonneg (r.re + r.im)]

(n : ℕ)
(P: Polynomial ℂ)
(npos : n > 0)
(Px : P.degree = n ∧ ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 0 n, P.coeff k = 2 ^ (k * (n - k)))
